name: Trashland
description:
Push all of the trash off the screen.

Arrow keys / AD to move. Up or W to jump. Down or S to fall quicker. R to restart 

Game music: Bit Bit Loop by Kevin Macleod.

Title music: Bitcoin Nation by Anonymous420

 https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Anonymous420/__________________________________________/Anonymous420_-___-_03_Bitcoin_Day
